titleStmt.title: The counter-plot, or, The close conspiracy of atheism and schism opened and so defeated and the doctrine and duty of evangelical obedience or Christian loyalty thereby asserted / by a real member of this most envy'd as most admired, because, best reformed Protestant Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Real member of this most envy'd, as, most admired, because, best reformed Protestant Church of England.
